_xResult.title: The Ana Marie Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cotton top with puffed sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
A beach less inhabited is the beach we imagine this top thriving in. Quiet dunes, sun kissed shores and rolling waves all cascade into one beautiful picture. A blanket is laid on the sand and laughter is shared between mothers, daughters, sons and friends. Don't let this picturesque day on the shore pass you by.

The Ana Marie Top is a soft pastel pullover blouse made of high quality quilted cotton fabric. Designer Tammi Anne Barker works primarily with natural fibers, transforming time honored techniques into wearable works of art. Unlike some types of cotton, quilted cotton is weightier, more durable and doesn’t cling to the body like similar materials. The look incorporates clean lines and simplicity into a classic fashion creation.

If you've never experienced having a tailored top made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let Tammi Anne know your desired measurements using the button below.
